replies.msg:
唔肯定係咪D，有冇人可以解答吓

What is the fundamental basis and reasoning of unrealized profit in ending (and/or beginning) inventory?

A. It is an issue of transfer pricing – the individual entities must pass merchandise on at its original price with no mark-up or markdown.
B. It is an issue of taxation – the consolidated entity must avoid double taxation and attempt to minimize taxes for each individual entity and the consolidated entity.
C. It is an issue of timing – when the consolidated entity, rather than the individual entity, earns the profit.
D. It is an issue of materiality – the individual entities in the consolidated entity cannot record sales to each other.
可唔可以比解釋

a

未實現利潤 肯定係pricing ，如果inventory marketprice比ending做嘅估價有premium 就會有profit 反之就係loss

畢業好耐 唔記得曬 淨記得unrealized profit大概講咩

C

講unrealised profit of inventory就似係講緊係做consolidation既時候間parent同subsidiary有intra group transaction 然後要eliminate個sales。

個inventory既profit要係third party買走左個inventory先可以realise個profit，如果唔係就要eliminate 左profit until 拎著intra group transaction 得來既inventory賣左出去。

所以係關timing 事～
